-- Generated global constants

g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_EBS_LANE_GROUP_MEMBERS';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION lgr_select_row( i_lgr_LNE_STN_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LNE_STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_lgr_LAP_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LAP_ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_lgr   OUT lm_ebs_lane_group_members%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION lgr_select_row_upd( i_lgr_LNE_STN_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LNE_STN_ID%TYPE
                           , i_lgr_LAP_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LAP_ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_lgr   OUT lm_ebs_lane_group_members%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE lgr_lock_row( i_lgr_LNE_STN_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LNE_STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_lgr_LAP_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LAP_ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE lgr_lock_row_nowait( i_lgr_LNE_STN_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LNE_STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_lgr_LAP_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LAP_ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE lgr_insert_row ( io_rt_lgr  IN OUT lm_ebs_lane_group_members%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION lgr_update_row( i_lgr_LNE_STN_ID   IN     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LNE_STN_ID%TYPE
                        , i_lgr_LAP_ID   IN     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LAP_ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_lgr  IN OUT lm_ebs_lane_group_members%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION lgr_delete_row( i_lgr_LNE_STN_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LNE_STN_ID%TYPE
                         , i_lgr_LAP_ID   IN  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.LAP_ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;


END lm_lgr_tapi_pck;
/




package body lm_lgr_tapi_pck
is




function lgr_select_row( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type
                       , o_rt_lgr   out lm_ebs_lane_group_members%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lgr ( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_ebs_lane_group_members lgr
            where lgr.lne_stn_id = i_lgr_lne_stn_id 
              and lgr.lap_id = i_lgr_lap_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_lgr( i_lgr_lne_stn_id => i_lgr_lne_stn_id, i_lgr_lap_id => i_lgr_lap_id );
         fetch c_lgr into o_rt_lgr;
         l_found := c_lgr%found;
         close c_lgr;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lgr%isopen
         then
            close c_lgr;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lgr_select_row;

function lgr_select_row_upd( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
                           , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type
                           , o_rt_lgr   out lm_ebs_lane_group_members%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_lgr ( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
                , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_ebs_lane_group_members lgr
            where lgr.lne_stn_id = i_lgr_lne_stn_id 
                and lgr.lap_id = i_lgr_lap_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_lgr( i_lgr_lne_stn_id => i_lgr_lne_stn_id
, i_lgr_lap_id => i_lgr_lap_id );
   fetch c_lgr into o_rt_lgr;
   l_found := c_lgr%found;
   close c_lgr;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_lgr%isopen
      then
         close c_lgr;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end lgr_select_row_upd;

procedure lgr_lock_row( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_lgr ( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_ebs_lane_group_members lgr
              where lgr.lne_stn_id = i_lgr_lne_stn_id 
                and lgr.lap_id = i_lgr_lap_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_lgr_lne_stn_id is not null
            or i_lgr_lap_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                lgr_lock_row_nowait( i_lgr_lne_stn_id => i_lgr_lne_stn_id
, i_lgr_lap_id => i_lgr_lap_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_lgr( i_lgr_lne_stn_id => i_lgr_lne_stn_id, i_lgr_lap_id => i_lgr_lap_id );
                  close c_lgr;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lgr%isopen
         then
            close c_lgr;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lgr_lock_row;

procedure lgr_lock_row_nowait( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lgr ( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_ebs_lane_group_members lgr
               where lgr.lne_stn_id = i_lgr_lne_stn_id 
                 and lgr.lap_id = i_lgr_lap_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_lgr_lne_stn_id is not null
         or i_lgr_lap_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_lgr( i_lgr_lne_stn_id => i_lgr_lne_stn_id, i_lgr_lap_id => i_lgr_lap_id );

            close c_lgr;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_lgr%isopen
        then
           close c_lgr;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'LNE_STN_ID = "'||i_lgr_lne_stn_id||'"'
                                                       ||', LAP_ID = "'||i_lgr_lap_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lgr_lock_row_nowait;

function lgr_perform_update( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type
                           , io_rt_lgr  in out lm_ebs_lane_group_members%rowtype )
return number
;

function lgr_perform_delete( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure lgr_insert_row ( io_rt_lgr  in out lm_ebs_lane_group_members%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_ebs_lane_group_members( lap_id
                                , lne_stn_id )
              values ( io_rt_lgr.lap_id
                     , io_rt_lgr.lne_stn_id )
           returning lap_id
                   , lne_stn_id
                into io_rt_lgr.lap_id
                   , io_rt_lgr.lne_stn_id;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('LAP_ID = "'||io_rt_lgr.lap_id||'"'
                                                             ||', LNE_STN_ID = "'||io_rt_lgr.lne_stn_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lgr_insert_row;

function lgr_perform_update( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type
                           , io_rt_lgr  in out lm_ebs_lane_group_members%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_ebs_lane_group_members
            set lap_id = io_rt_lgr.lap_id
              , lne_stn_id = io_rt_lgr.lne_stn_id
          where lne_stn_id = i_lgr_lne_stn_id
            and lap_id = i_lgr_lap_id
      returning lap_id
              , lne_stn_id
           into io_rt_lgr.lap_id
              , io_rt_lgr.lne_stn_id;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('LAP_ID = "'||io_rt_lgr.lap_id||'"'
                                                             ||', LNE_STN_ID = "'||io_rt_lgr.lne_stn_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lgr_perform_update;

function lgr_perform_delete( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
 , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_ebs_lane_group_members
          where lne_stn_id = i_lgr_lne_stn_id
            and lap_id = i_lgr_lap_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'LNE_STN_ID = "'||i_lgr_lne_stn_id||'"'
                                                         ||', LAP_ID = "'||i_lgr_lap_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lgr_perform_delete;

function lgr_update_row( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
                        , i_lgr_lap_id   in     lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type
                       , io_rt_lgr  in out lm_ebs_lane_group_members%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lgr_lock_row( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   =>  i_lgr_lne_stn_id
 , i_lgr_lap_id   =>  i_lgr_lap_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            lgr_perform_update( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   =>  i_lgr_lne_stn_id
 , i_lgr_lap_id   =>  i_lgr_lap_id
                              , io_rt_lgr  => io_rt_lgr );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('LAP_ID = "'||io_rt_lgr.lap_id||'"'
                                                          ||', LNE_STN_ID = "'||io_rt_lgr.lne_stn_id||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end lgr_update_row;

function lgr_delete_row( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lne_stn_id%type
                         , i_lgr_lap_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_group_members.lap_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgr_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lgr_lock_row( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   =>  i_lgr_lne_stn_id
          , i_lgr_lap_id   =>  i_lgr_lap_id );

         
         l_deleted := lgr_perform_delete( i_lgr_lne_stn_id   =>  i_lgr_lne_stn_id
 , i_lgr_lap_id   =>  i_lgr_lap_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'LNE_STN_ID = "'||i_lgr_lne_stn_id||'"'
                                                      ||', LAP_ID = "'||i_lgr_lap_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lgr_delete_row;


end lm_lgr_tapi_pck;
